skill.name: Third Law
skill.normal: The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by 5%.
skill.ace: Your sentry guns gain a protective shield.

skill.name: Sentry Targeting Package
skill.normal: Your sentry gun's accuracy is improved by 100%.
skill.ace: Your sentry gun's rotational speed is increased by 150%. Your sentry gun is loaded with 50% extra ammo.

skill.name: Eco Sentry
skill.normal: The cost of deploying a sentry gun is reduced by 5%.
skill.ace: Your sentry guns gain 150% increased health.

skill.name: Engineering
skill.normal: You can now make a less noisy version of the sentry guns, making them less likely to be targeted by enemies.
skill.ace: You can now toggle AP rounds on your sentry guns, lowering the rate of fire by 75%, but increasing damage by 250% and allowing to pierce shields.

skill.name: Jack of all Trades
skill.normal: You deploy and interact with all deployables 100% faster
skill.ace: You can now equip a second deployable to bring with you. The second deployable has 50% less uses.

skill.name: Tower Defence
skill.normal: You can now carry 1 extra sentry guns.
skill.ace: You can now carry an additional 2 sentry guns.

skill.name: Hardware Expert
skill.normal: You fix the drill 25% faster. Drills are silent.
skill.ace: Gives your drills and saws a 10% chance to automatically restart after breaking.

skill.name: Combat Engineering
skill.normal: The radius of trip mine explosions are increased by 30%.
skill.ace: Your trip mines deal 50% more damage.

skill.name: Drill Sawgeant
skill.normal: Your drill and saw efficiency is increased by 15%.
skill.ace: Further increases your drill and saw efficiency increased by 15%.

skill.name: More Firepower
skill.normal: You gain 1 more shape charge and 4 more trip mines.
skill.ace: You gain 2 more shape charges and 7 more trip mines.

skill.name: Kick Starter
skill.normal: Your drills and saws gain an additional 20% to automatically restart after breaking.
skill.ace: You gain the ability to restart a drill by hitting it with a melee attack. You get a chance for each time it breaks with a 50% success rate.

skill.name: Fire Trap
skill.normal: Your trip mines now spread fire around the area of detonation for 10 seconds in a 4m diameter
skill.ace: The duration of the trip mine fire effect is increased by 10 seconds and the radius of the fire effect is increased by 50%.

skill.name: Heavy Impact
skill.normal: Your shots have a 5% chance to stagger all enemies except Bulldozers and Captain Winters.

skill.name: Fire Control
skill.normal: You gain 12 weapon accuracy while firing from the hip.
skill.ace: You gain a decreased accuracy penalty by 20% when shooting while moving.

skill.name: Lock N Load
skill.normal: You can now hip-fire with your weapon while sprinting
skill.ace: Killing 2 enemies with SMGs, LMGs or Rifles set on automatic fire mode will reduce your next reload time by up to 60%. This bonus is reduced by 1% for each bullet above 20 in the total magazine size, down to a minimum of 20% reload time reduction.

skill.name: Surefire
skill.normal: SMG, LMG and rifles fired in auto mode gain 15 more bullets in the magazine. Does not effect the "Shock and Awe" ace skill.
skill.ace: You gain the ability to pierce body armour.

skill.name: Body Expertise
skill.normal: 33% from the bonus headshot damage is applied to the enemies body with SMGs, LMGs and rifles fired in automatic mode.
skill.ace: 100% from the bonus headshot damage is applied to the enemies body with SMGs, LMGs and rifles fired in automatic mode.
